name: Brian Hoang
bio:
Brian Hoang is a junior studying Software Engineering, with the intention of contributing
			  towards the field of artificial intelligence. He is a Research Assistant in the PAIR Lab and 
			  the Human Language Technology Research Institute, and has held software engineering internships 
			  at IntelliEpi and Raytheon. During his spare time, Brian can be found playing sports, rocking a piano, 
			  or watching horror movies with his eyes closed.
